resources.string: Please understand this is not a professional recommendation, this is based on the guidelines of MOHFW and WHO
Are you experiencing any of these symptoms?
Have you travelled anywhere in last 14 days?
Does any of these apply to you?
I recently interacted or lived with someone who has tested positive for COVID-19
I am a healthcare worker and I recently dealt with a COVID-19 confirmed case
This app is made to spread awareness about COVID-19 and is dedicated to all the frontline workers working day and night to save lives
